channel.title: POS (player owned shops) A WORK IN PROGRESS!
channel.description:
Here will be updated news on our progress.
What will this be? Answer: This will be a project that will be useful for a server. People that join your server will have the opportunity to actually make their own shop and buy from it. End of complaining on your server, ey?
[b][u][i]~Who will be working on this project:~[/i][/u][/b]
guthan38 Mrquarter boomer216

item.title: POS (player owned shops) A WORK IN PROGRESS!
item.dc:creator: @Substance Substance
item.description:
@Substance wrote:

[quote=“uber killer, post:13, topic:26627”][quote author=Substance link=topic=39741.msg481543#msg481543 date=1163910608]

This is easy to make… Why do you need a team to make such a simple project?

For some it is easier than others. Also they are going to do a very good job instead of doing a half-good job.
[/quote]

So you are saying I always do a half-good job? How do you know?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 18, 2006, 05:31:38 PM[/size][hr][quote author=guthan38 link=topic=39741.msg481558#msg481558 date=1163910689]
hmmm…uber do it then alllll by yourself. I want to see it in the next 3 hours that should be enough time for a ‘leet’ coder like yourself, ey?

[/quote]

Alright, i’ll get on it.[/quote]

I guess you are the type of “leet” coders that say they will do something and they just abandon the boards and act like an idiot.

Untill I see the code and test it you arn’t any better of a coder than a newb that just joined.

Read full topic
